hero_image.alt: Hero image for Maintenance Audit Requirements WHS Australia: The Definitive Guide to Compliance and Liability Reduction

image_prompt: A photo-realistic, high-resolution hero image set inside a modern Australian manufacturing facility. The scene features a diverse group of maintenance professionals (men and women) conducting a safety audit. They are wearing full PPE including hard hats, high-visibility vests, and safety glasses. One technician is inspecting a large industrial motor, while a manager stands nearby holding a tablet (back of tablet visible only) overseeing the process. The background shows blurred industrial machinery, yellow safety walkways, and lockout/tagout stations. The lighting is bright and professional, emphasizing safety and compliance. No text or overlays in the image.
